defaults.title: Confirmation Required
defaults.message: Are you sure you want to proceed?
defaults.confirmationText: I confirm that I accept responsibility for this action

messages.workingTimeViolation: You are currently outside working hours. Are you sure you want to proceed?
messages.deleteConfirm: This will permanently delete this item. This action cannot be undone.
messages.saveConfirm: Do you want to save your changes?
messages.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them before leaving?
messages.criticalAction: This is a critical action that requires confirmation.
